## Mercado Ads

<div class="andes-message andes-message--highlight">

<div class="andes-message__content">

Important:

<div class="andes-message__text--highlight site-carriers__message-text">

<div>

This feature is available only in Brazil, Mexico and Chile.

</div>

</div>

</div>

</div>

Mercado Ads is an advertising solution, integrated into Mercado Libre,
to give more product visibility to people who are looking for what you
sell within the platform.  
  
From the very beginning, all your products become sponsored listings.
You will automatically see a daily recommended budget. It is a suggested
amount that estimates the clicks you will receive on the listing. You
can modify and adjust it according to your needs.  
  
Once you establish the amount you want to invest, we take care that your
ads reach your potential customers every time they search for those
products on the platform. That is, we show your ads to people who are
looking for what you sell.  
  
See more details for sellers, like [How to create advertising campaigns
in Product
Ads](https://sellers.mercadolibre.com/news/how-to-create-advertising-campaigns-in-product-ads),
[How the Product Ads bidding system
works](https://sellers.mercadolibre.com/news/how-the-product-ads-bidding-system-works)
and [Advertise on Mercado Libre and attract more
customers](https://sellers.mercadolibre.com/news/advertise-on-mercado-libre-and-attract-more-customers).  
  
For more information, you can visit [Mercado Ads for Global
Selling](https://global-selling.mercadolibre.com/productAds).

  

**Next**: [Product
Ads](https://global-selling.mercadolibre.com/devsite/new-product-ads).
